jobs.Company: Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit
jobs.Title: Application Developer
Application Developer
Responsibilities: Worked alongside a team of developers, designers, product managers, and project managers to produce and deploy a finished web application.
Designed and built the backend for a web application using Ruby on Rails, Redis, and Postgresql.
Designed and built a relational database structure for multiple web applications using Postgresql.
Built a live-updating chat application using Websockets, Actioncable, and Turbo Rails.
Learned as a mentee to a team of professional application developers.
Contributed to the development of web applications purchased by client businesses.

jobs.Title: Technology Intern
Responsibilities: Maintained a database of all organization contacts to facilitate proper communication and funding between donors and recipients.
Gathered and updated data for more than 300 recipients for proper reporting and analysis.
Researched and performed statistical analysis on the age distribution of injured veterans and their children to predict future funding requirements for the organization.
Calculated the minimum and maximum liability of individual recipients based on their preferred institutions and potential financial assistance.
Assisted staff with selecting and learning new software to help the organization increase efficiency and allow for greater intake.

education.Degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
